subject: Pensions and Retirement Plans
Sex Crimes
Child Abuse and Neglect
Football (College)
lead_paragraph: Pennsylvania’s state pension system will send Jerry Sandusky a $211,000 check next week to cover payments going back to when it illegally stopped his retirement benefits after he was sentenced for child molestation.
snippet: Pennsylvania’s state pension system will send Jerry Sandusky a $211,000 check next week to cover payments going back to when it illegally stopped his retirement benefits after he was sentenced for child molestation.
